name: ğŸ”— ENHANCED API INTEGRATION WORKFLOW
description: Production API gateway with intelligent routing, authentication, and comprehensive error handling

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ {
  "request_id": $json.context?.requestId || 'unknown',
  "method": "POST",
  "endpoint": "/api-integration",
  "action": $json.routing?.action || 'unknown',
  "target_workflow": $json.routing?.targetWorkflow || 'unknown',
  "priority": $json.routing?.priority || 'MEDIUM',
  "client_ip": $json.context?.clientInfo?.ip || 'unknown',
  "user_agent": $json.context?.clientInfo?.userAgent || 'unknown',
  "auth_valid": $json.context?.authentication?.valid || false,
  "response_status": $json.executed ? 'SUCCESS' : 'PENDING',
  "execution_time_ms": Date.now() - new Date($json.context?.timestamp || new Date()).getTime(),
  "request_payload": JSON.stringify($json.payload || {}),
  "response_data": JSON.stringify($json.response || {}),
  "created_at": new Date().toISOString()
} }}
